Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and prepare the agenda for the team check-in meeting.
Team Check-in Meeting. Review progress, address challenges, and ensure everyone is aligned on the project goals.
Document action items from the team check-in meeting and assign them to relevant team members.
Monitor the completion of action items and follow up with team members as needed.
Update the project schedule based on the outcomes of the team check-in meeting.
Analyze project data to identify any potential areas for improvement in the project management process.
Implement process improvements to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of the project management efforts.
Prepare a summary of the week's accomplishments and lessons learned for future reference.
Review progress, update project schedule, and prepare for next week's goals.
